configurationParameter.name: StopWordFile
configurationParameter.description: Path to the stop word file. If empty no use ? Must be specified ?

configurationParameter.name: WindowSize
configurationParameter.description: Window size in number of words. Hearst suggested 30. Choi claimed the same but its default value was 100 in its implementation. It depends on the number of words per sentence/proposition and also if we words with raw words, post tag filtered words, stems... and from the text genre... Set it to -1 if you want the program to determine automatically the "best" value. The computation is based on simple homemade empirical heuristic which set the best value to 3 times the average size of a sentence in terms of words.

configurationParameter.name: StepSize
configurationParameter.description: Size of the step to shift the window. Hearst suggested 5. Choi claimed the same but its default value was 10 in its implementation. It depends on the number of words per sentence/proposition and also if we words with raw words, post tag filtered words, stems... and from the text genre... Set it to -1 if you want the program to determine automatically the "best" value. The computation is based on simple homemade empirical heuristic which set the best value to 1 time the average size of a sentence in terms of words.

configurationParameter.name: InputView
configurationParameter.description: CAS view to proceed. By default this view will be the `_InitialView`. If you do not now, then leaving it empty will probably be a good choice.

configurationParameter.name: InputSentenceAnnotation
configurationParameter.description: Annotation type which corresponds to a sentence unit. By default `org.apache.uima.SentenceAnnotation`

configurationParameter.name: InputWordAnnotation
configurationParameter.description: Annotation type which corresponds to a word unit. By default will be `org.apache.uima.TokenAnnotation`

configurationParameter.name: InputWordFeature
configurationParameter.description: Corresponds to the word token feature to consider. Default is `coveredText` but can be set to `stem`.

configurationParameter.name: OutputSegmentAnnotation
configurationParameter.description: Annotation to create for each text segment detected. By default it is set to `fr.univnantes.lina.uima.textSegmenter.types.SegmentAnnotation`.
